melee: mwk trident +17/+12 (1d8+7), claw +16 (1d4+6/19-20 plus 1d6 cold), bite +15 (1d4+4 plus 1d6 cold)
other_gear: +1 breastplate, mwk trident, mwk underwater heavy crossbow with 20 bolts, cloak of resistance +1, frost amulet of mighty fists, 1,033 gp
languages: Aquan, Common, Infernal; speak with sharks
feats: Blood Tide*, Combat Expertise, Greater Blood Frenzy*, Improved Critical (claw), Lunge, Multiattack, Power Attack, Weapon Focus (claw), Weapon Specialization (claw)

sections.body:
Before Combat The sahuagin baron drinks its potions of bear's endurance and bull's strength .

Base Statistics Without bear's endurance and bull's strength, the baron's statistics are

hp 83

Fort +9

Melee mwk trident +15/+10 (1d8+5), claw +14 (1d4+5/19–20 plus 1d6 cold), bite +13 (1d6+3 plus 1d6 cold)

Str 20

Con 17

CMB +14

CMD 27

sections.body: A sahuagin prince is a paragon of ferocity and political skill.

sections.name: Sahuagin Prince

name: Sahuagin Baron
skills: Climb +12, Intimidate +10, Knowledge (nobility) +12, Perception +13, Ride +14, Sense Motive +10, Swim +18
combat_gear: potion of bear's endurance, potion of bull's strength, potion of cure moderate wounds
